meta.name: theme-color

meta.content: We are taking a proactive measure and have decided that IAS will be closed beginning Monday, March 16th through Monday, April 6th, with a planned return to school on Tuesday, April 7th.. As usual, in your daily life, please follow the guidelines provided in earlier communication and from the CDC regarding the best practices for preventing the spread of the virus.  We will be updating you as more information becomes available.

link.title: School Closure - International Academy of Saginaw

img.p: We are taking a proactive measure and have decided that IAS will be closed beginning Monday, March 16th through Monday, April 6th, with a planned return to school on Tuesday, April 7th...
As usual, in your daily life, please follow the guidelines provided in earlier communication and from the CDC regarding the best practices for preventing the spread of the virus.
We will be updating you as more information becomes available.
